section.note: As of 6 July 2017, the installation and upgrade procedures in the 1.3.3 documentation set have been modified to successfully install Docker CE 17.03, which was tested and certified for 1.3.3. A new release of is not necessary to work around the impact of Docker CE 17.06.
As of June 29, 2017, a new release of Docker (version 17.06) has negatively impacted our installation process for 1.3.3. A fix to this issue will be released on Monday, July 3, 2017 as 1.3.4.
